mapper.insert: insert into manager (mqID, roleID, managerName, managerPsd, managerSex, Tel, Address, Comment) values (#{mqID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update manager set roleID = #{roleID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerName = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerPsd = #{managerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, managerSex = #{managerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, Tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mqID = #{mqID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select mqID, roleID, managerName, managerPsd, managerSex, Tel, Address, Comment from manager
